io.uiza.core.view.draggablepanel

Interface DraggableListener


  • public interface DraggableListener
    Listener created to be notified when some drag actions are performed over DraggablePanel or DraggableView instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClosedToLeft()
      Called when the view is closed to the left.
      void onClosedToRight()
      Called when the view is closed to the right.
      void onDrag(int left, int top, int dx, int dy) 
      void onMaximized()
      Called when the view is maximized.
      void onMinimized()
      Called when the view is minimized.
